summary: The film follows the life of Sada Abe, who became a celebrity in 1936 after strangling her lover and slicing off his penis.
cast: Hitomi Kuroki|Tsurutarô Kataoka|Norihei Miki|Kippei Shîna|Toshie Negishi|Bengal|Renji Ishibashi|Kyûsaku Shimada|Emiko Azuma|Yasufumi Hayashi|Hisashi Igawa|Mansaku Ikeuchi|Wakaba Irie|Ayumi Itô|Kôen Okumura|Kanehiro Ri|Jirô Sakagami|Tomorô Taguchi
title: Sada: Gesaku · Abe Sada no shôgai
